pre-wrap;">喂，我看你总是东奔西跑地替人办事，图的不止是摩拉吧？你一定也是个豪爽仗义的人！哈正好，本大爷最喜欢跟仗义的人打交道，我们绝对能成为超级合拍的搭档！</p></div> <div class="obc-tmpl__fold-tag">

src="https://uploadstatic.mihoyo.com/ys-obc/2022/01/16/291696164/cfb03025543559dad93fbb7986b83356_6514106090396972005.mp3"></audio></span></p><p style="white-space: pre-wrap;">听弟兄们说，他是第一百颗神之眼狩眼仪式的主角？嗯？为什么他会有专属的仪式啊？欸，难道说第一百颗神之眼是比前九十九颗厉害吗？嘶…不对，真是那样的话，那应该是本大爷来当这第一百颗才对！</p></div> <div class="obc-tmpl__fold-tag">
      [<span class="obc-tmpl__fold-text">折叠</span><span class="obc-tmpl__expand-text">展开</span>]
    </div></div></div><div style="order: 1;"> <div data-part="main" data-tmpl="fold" class="obc-tmpl__part obc-tmpl-fold obc-tmpl__part--main obc-tmpl__part--fold obc-tmpl__part--align-banner"><div class="obc-tmpl__rich-text obc-tmpl-fold__title"><p style="white-space: pre-wrap;">关于神里绫人…</p></div> <div class="obc-tmpl__paragraph-box obc-tmpl__rich-text"><p style="white-space: pre-wrap; min-height: 1.5em;"><span class="audio"><audio controls="controls" controlslist="nodownload"><source src="https://uploadstatic.mihoyo.com/ys-obc/2022/01/16/291696164/598784dc48680630a00c8aa0e9c07d08_3984098428249185197.mp3"></audio></span></p><p style="white-space: pre-wrap;">哈哈哈哈，我跟绫人兄可以说是相见恨晚啊！如果不是他提醒我「让温顺的虫子燃起斗志」是我一生都该坚守的觉悟，也许早在第七百八十次战败时，我就放弃斗虫了…哈哈，果然只有男人最懂男人，哎呀，我和他之间无需多言，在打牌和斗虫时，默契就已经悉数体现了。</p></div> <div class="obc-tmpl__fold-tag">
      [<span class="obc-tmpl__fold-text">折叠</span><span class="obc-tmpl__expand-text">展开</span>]
    </div></div></div><div style="order: 2;"> <div data-part="main" data-tmpl="fold" class="obc-tmpl__part obc-tmpl-fold obc-tmpl__part--main obc-tmpl__part--fold obc-tmpl__part--align-banner"><div class="obc-tmpl__rich-text obc-tmpl-fold__title"><p style="white-space: pre-wrap;">关于宵宫…</p></div> <div class="obc-tmpl__paragraph-box obc-tmpl__rich-text"><p style="white-space: pre-wrap; min-height: 1.5em;"><span class="audio"><audio controls="controls" controlslist="nodownload"><source src="https://uploadstatic.mihoyo.com/ys-obc/2022/01/16/291696164/b90f827946ab8bcdf92509b48e17a191_1856787804943540314.mp3"></audio></span></p><p style="white-space: pre-wrap;">那家伙，仗着自己会做烟花和小玩具，哄起小孩来一套一套的…不行，不能让她抢尽风头，「孩子王」本大爷是当定了！你也要站我这边…什么？你不是孩子？呵，在我眼里，比我矮的，全是孩子！</p></div> <div class="obc-tmpl__fold-tag">
      [<span class="obc-tmpl__fold-text">折叠</span><span class="obc-tmpl__expand-text">展开</span>]
    </div></div></div><div style="order: 3;"> <div data-part="main" data-tmpl="fold" class="obc-tmpl__part obc-tmpl-fold obc-tmpl__part--main obc-tmpl__part--fold obc-tmpl__part--align-banner"><div class="obc-tmpl__rich-text obc-tmpl-fold__title"><p style="white-space: pre-wrap;">关于枫原万叶…</p></div> <div class="obc-tmpl__paragraph-box obc-tmpl__rich-text"><p style="white-space: pre-wrap; min-height: 1.5em;"><span class="audio"><audio controls="controls" controlslist="nodownload"><source src="https://uploadstatic.mihoyo.com/ys-obc/2022/01/16/291696164/d38e6aded6cf17e56615549ae7f64cf0_2733351494841810320.mp3"></audio></span></p><p style="white-space: pre-wrap;">听说你从天守阁逃出来后，是他挡下了「无想的一刀」？帅啊！到底怎么做到的。你想，他是没落的贵族，我是没落的鬼族…某种意义上，我和他旗鼓相当啊。哈哈哈哈，那么，下一刀，本大爷替你挡了！</p></div> <div class="obc-tmpl__fold-tag">
      [<span class="obc-tmpl__fold-text">折叠</span><span class="obc-tmpl__expand-text">展开</span>]
    </div></div></div><div style="order: 4;"> <div data-part="main" data-tmpl="fold" class="obc-tmpl__part obc-tmpl-fold obc-tmpl__part--main obc-tmpl__part--fold obc-tmpl__part--align-banner"><div class="obc-tmpl__rich-text obc-tmpl-fold__title"><p style="white-space: pre-wrap;">关于雷电将军…</p></div> <div class="obc-tmpl__paragraph-box obc-tmpl__rich-text"><p style="white-space: pre-wrap; min-height: 1.5em;"><span class="audio"><audio controls="controls" controlslist="nodownload"><source src="https://uploadstatic.mihoyo.com/ys-obc/2022/01/16/291696164/358a5dc684e603c61ed256319374d9b7_7877262749337812959.mp3"></audio></span></p><p style="white-space: pre-wrap;">搞眼狩令的时候，需要出动她得意的天狗才能制服我，说明本大爷一定让她很头痛吧？不过，既然她决定废除眼狩令，也不算无可救药。哼，她最好记住这次的教训，别再有下次，不然，我一定会让她更头痛，哼。</p></div> <div class="obc-tmpl__fold-tag">
      [<span class="obc-tmpl__fold-text">折叠</span><span class="obc-tmpl__expand-text">展开</span>]
    </div></div></div><div style="order: 5;"> <div data-part="main" data-tmpl="fold" class="obc-tmpl__part obc-tmpl-fold obc-tmpl__part--main obc-tmpl__part--fold obc-tmpl__part--align-banner"><div class="obc-tmpl__rich-text obc-tmpl-fold__title"><p style="white-space: pre-wrap;">关于狐耳女人…</p></div> <div class="obc-tmpl__paragraph-box obc-tmpl__rich-text"><p style="white-space: pre-wrap; min-height: 1.5em;"><span class="audio"><audio controls="controls" controlslist="nodownload"><source src="https://uploadstatic.mihoyo.com/ys-obc/2022/01/16/291696164/87b0d0c703dea213ca98dbfe3c96d044_3194902350505032616.mp3"></audio></span></p><p style="white-space: pre-wrap;">那场狐狸拉面比赛，是我赢了，就算面里有油豆腐，她也别想赢我！那之后…那之后我躺了一个多月，但我至少守住了胜者的荣耀！而她，就要承受付清三十二碗面钱的耻辱。哈哈哈哈…</p></div> <div class="obc-tmpl__fold-tag">
      [<span class="obc-tmpl__fold-text">折叠</span><span class="obc-tmpl__expand-text">展开</span>]
    </div></div></div><div style="order: 6;"> <div data-part="main" data-tmpl="fold" class="obc-tmpl__part obc-tmpl-fold obc-tmpl__part--main obc-tmpl__part--fold obc-tmpl__part--align-banner"><div class="obc-tmpl__rich-text obc-tmpl-fold__title"><p style="white-space: pre-wrap;">关于九条裟罗…</p></div> <div class="obc-tmpl__paragraph-box obc-tmpl__rich-text"><p style="white-space: pre-wrap; min-height: 1.5em;"><span class="audio"><audio controls="controls" controlslist="nodownload"><source src="https://uploadstatic.mihoyo.com/ys-obc/2022/01/16/291696164/cae9cdf4aaa996a0855786eb79229ecb_5070758552807383200.mp3"></audio></span></p><p style="white-space: pre-wrap;">眼狩令那会我确实败给她了，呵，这也没什么好羞耻的，输了就堂堂正正投降，错了就老老实实挨打，这才是真男人！反倒是她，堂堂天狗，不敢应我的复仇之约。哼，不过是在十字路口相扑而已，这就怕了？她要是再不来应战我就不叫她九条天狗了，我要叫她——九条乌龟！</p></div> <div class="obc-tmpl__fold-tag">
      [<span class="obc-tmpl__fold-text">折叠</span><span class="obc-tmpl__expand-text">展开</span>]
    </div></div></div><div style="order: 7;"> <div data-part="main" data-tmpl="fold" class="obc-tmpl__part obc-tmpl-fold obc-tmpl__part--main obc-tmpl__part--fold obc-tmpl__part--align-banner"><div class="obc-tmpl__rich-text obc-tmpl-fold__title"><p style="white-space: pre-wrap;">关于五郎…</p></div> <div class="obc-tmpl__paragraph-box obc-tmpl__rich-text"><p style="white-space: pre-wrap; min-height: 1.5em;"><span class="audio"><audio controls="controls" controlslist="nodownload"><source src="https://uploadstatic.mihoyo.com/ys-obc/2022/01/16/291696164/0fd294e1f04da99dd8a997d2439312dd_8758267077756139018.mp3"></audio></span></p><p style="white-space: pre-wrap;">哦，反抗军的小狗大将嘛，身材小小但气魄非凡，不错不错！而且，他身上散发着一种让人内心温暖的熟悉感…奇怪，明明没见过他几面…</p></div> <div class="obc-tmpl__fold-tag">
      [<span class="obc-tmpl__fold-text">折叠</span><span class="obc-tmpl__expand-text">展开</span>]
    </div></div></div><div style="order: 8;"> <div data-part="main" data-tmpl="fold" class="obc-tmpl__part obc-tmpl-fold obc-tmpl__part--main obc-tmpl__part--fold obc-tmpl__part--align-banner"><div class="obc-tmpl__rich-text obc-tmpl-fold__title"><p style="white-space: pre-wrap;">关于久岐忍…</p></div> <div class="obc-tmpl__paragraph-box obc-tmpl__rich-text"><p style="white-space: pre-wrap; min-height: 1.5em;"><span class="audio"><audio controls="controls" controlslist="nodownload"><source src="https://uploadstatic.mihoyo.com/ys-obc/2022/01/16/291696164/14b14ecae7562e25b67055ab66f431b6_8246624635963441066.mp3"></audio></span></p><p style="white-space: pre-wrap;">荒泷派的弟兄们一般都会顺着我意，唯独这个忍啊，老是跟我唱反调！本大爷辛辛苦苦赢来的战利品，竟然被她一件件还了回去。哎呀，算了，看在她每次都会把我从牢房里捞出来，还替我们收拾了不少烂摊子，就不计较了。毕竟惹怒了她，我也没有好日子过…</p></div> <div class="obc-tmpl__fold-tag">
      [<span class="obc-tmpl__fold-text">折叠</span><span class="obc-tmpl__expand-text">展开</span>]
    </div></div></div><div style="order: 9;"> <div data-part="main" data-tmpl="fold" class="obc-tmpl__part obc-tmpl-fold obc-tmpl__part--main obc-tmpl__part--fold obc-tmpl__part--align-banner"><div class="obc-tmpl__rich-text obc-tmpl-fold__title"><p style="white-space: pre-wrap;">关于早柚…</p></div> <div class="obc-tmpl__paragraph-box obc-tmpl__rich-text"><p style="white-space: pre-wrap; min-height: 1.5em;"><span class="audio"><audio controls="controls" controlslist="nodownload"><source src="https://uploadstatic.mihoyo.com/ys-obc/2022/01/16/291696164/672b4745b7fd52e34961912dcc08e90b_1939873354314122552.mp3"></audio></span></p><p style="white-space: pre-wrap;">不过是趁她不注意的时候，摸了摸她的头而已，现在一见面就要跳起来打我。哈哈哈没办法，这么可爱的小狸猫，谁见了都会忍不住想去摸摸头吧？噢对了…喊她狸猫也会被揍。为什么啊，那不就是狸猫吗…？</p></div> <div class="obc-tmpl__fold-tag">
      [<span class="obc-tmpl__fold-text">折叠</span><span class="obc-tmpl__expand-text">展开</span>]
    </div></div></div></div><div class="obc-tmpl obc-tmpl--col-l2r1" pre-wrap;">你一定很想问，为什么我只会斗虫和打牌，却能稳坐荒泷派老大的宝座？哼，的确，只会这些小儿科难以服众。干脆就一口气告诉你吧！我还会倒立吃拉面、睁着眼睡觉、用鼻孔吹口琴、用发梢拍苍蝇这类绝活。怎么样，消除你心中的疑惑了吧？</p></div> <div class="obc-tmpl__fold-tag">
      [<span class="obc-tmpl__fold-text">折叠</span><span class="obc-tmpl__expand-text">展开</span>]
    </div></div></div><div style="order: 1;"> <div data-part="main" data-tmpl="fold" class="obc-tmpl__part obc-tmpl-fold obc-tmpl__part--main obc-tmpl__part--fold obc-tmpl__part--align-banner"><div class="obc-tmpl__rich-text obc-tmpl-fold__title"><p style="white-space: pre-wrap;">想要了解荒泷一斗·其二</p></div> <div class="obc-tmpl__paragraph-box obc-tmpl__rich-text"><p style="white-space: pre-wrap; min-height: 1.5em;"><span class="audio"><audio controls="controls" controlslist="nodownload"><source src="https://uploadstatic.mihoyo.com/ys-obc/2022/01/16/291696164/5d4564833ccf6937db8ecf62a06f405f_4801406747085365260.mp3"></audio></span></p><p style="white-space: pre-wrap;">稻妻人每逢过节、搬家、生病，都爱撒豆子，一边撒还一边念念叨叨，「福豆撒落，鬼怪败挫」、「福来福来，鬼去鬼去」…我都听出耳茧了。关键是豆子还经常撒出路面来，害我过敏…可恶啊！我一定要为鬼族正名，鬼啥也没干！别有事没事就想着驱鬼驱魔的。</p></div> <div class="obc-tmpl__fold-tag">
      [<span class="obc-tmpl__fold-text">折叠</span><span class="obc-tmpl__expand-text">展开</span>]
    </div></div></div><div style="order: 2;"> <div data-part="main" data-tmpl="fold" class="obc-tmpl__part obc-tmpl-fold obc-tmpl__part--main obc-tmpl__part--fold obc-tmpl__part--align-banner"><div class="obc-tmpl__rich-text obc-tmpl-fold__title"><p style="white-space: pre-wrap;">想要了解荒泷一斗·其三</p></div> <div class="obc-tmpl__paragraph-box obc-tmpl__rich-text"><p style="white-space: pre-wrap; min-height: 1.5em;"><span class="audio"><audio controls="controls" controlslist="nodownload"><source src="https://uploadstatic.mihoyo.com/ys-obc/2022/01/16/291696164/2b682f02ad7a519e2085ef7ac3e87a7c_8942877922234698974.mp3"></audio></span></p><p style="white-space: pre-wrap;">为了消除人类对鬼族的偏见，有次我让弟兄们把我温柔和蔼的形象用留影机拍成画片，贴在稻妻城的留言板上。欸，结果有些人竟敢在画片上乱涂乱画！更可恨的是，天领奉行的蠢货足轻说我引起社会治安恐慌，社奉行又说什么败坏风气，连勘定奉行的走狗都要来要什么广告营业税…嘶…真是不识好歹！</p></div> <div class="obc-tmpl__fold-tag">
      [<span class="obc-tmpl__fold-text">折叠</span><span class="obc-tmpl__expand-text">展开</span>]
    </div></div></div><div style="order: 3;"> <div data-part="main" data-tmpl="fold" class="obc-tmpl__part obc-tmpl-fold obc-tmpl__part--main obc-tmpl__part--fold obc-tmpl__part--align-banner"><div class="obc-tmpl__rich-text obc-tmpl-fold__title"><p style="white-space: pre-wrap;">想要了解荒泷一斗·其四</p></div> <div class="obc-tmpl__paragraph-box obc-tmpl__rich-text"><p style="white-space: pre-wrap; min-height: 1.5em;"><span class="audio"><audio controls="controls" controlslist="nodownload"><source src="https://uploadstatic.mihoyo.com/ys-obc/2022/01/16/291696164/d43466603e566dc8a680dc378fba76c5_861509121499255508.mp3"></audio></span></p><p style="white-space: pre-wrap;">包容和理解这些有过不幸经历的人，这才是我荒泷派的「骄傲」。…你别听外面的人说什么怪不怪人的，在我眼里，他们每一位都是我重要的家人。呵，这群小子也抱着和我一样的想法，不管怎样都会和荒泷派同甘共苦。</p></div> <div class="obc-tmpl__fold-tag">
      [<span class="obc-tmpl__fold-text">折叠</span><span class="obc-tmpl__expand-text">展开</span>]
    </div></div></div><div style="order: 4;"> <div data-part="main" data-tmpl="fold" class="obc-tmpl__part obc-tmpl-fold obc-tmpl__part--main obc-tmpl__part--fold obc-tmpl__part--align-banner"><div class="obc-tmpl__rich-text obc-tmpl-fold__title"><p style="white-space: pre-wrap;">想要了解荒泷一斗·其五</p></div> <div class="obc-tmpl__paragraph-box obc-tmpl__rich-text"><p style="white-space: pre-wrap; min-height: 1.5em;"><span class="audio"><audio controls="controls" controlslist="nodownload"><source src="https://uploadstatic.mihoyo.com/ys-obc/2022/01/16/291696164/7829542ffa91c4d96fbfdbf263005a35_3515494120838594526.mp3"></audio></span></p><p style="white-space: pre-wrap;">我很敬佩青鬼「牺牲自己换取赤鬼延续」的行为，但绝不认同他们的理念。「更好地活下去」绝不该靠牺牲同类换取，应该是「一起更好地活着」才对。自顾自地牺牲…独自耍帅的行为算什么嘛…唉…过去已经没办法改变了。但今后，在我荒泷一斗的眼皮子底下，没有人可以随便牺牲自己。本大爷，要挡在你们前面！</p></div> <div class="obc-tmpl__fold-tag">
      [<span class="obc-tmpl__fold-text">折叠</span><span class="obc-tmpl__expand-text">展开</span>]
    </div></div></div></div><div class="obc-tmpl obc-tmpl--col-l2r1" data-data="%5B%7B%22tmplKey%22%3A%22fold%22%2C%22partKey%22%3A%22main%22%2C%22data%22%3A%7B%22layout_%22%3A%22banner%22%2C%22title%22%3A%22%3Cp%20style%3D%5C%22white-space%3A%20pre-wrap%3B%5C%22%3E%E8%8D%92%E6%B3%B7%E4%B8%80%E6%96%97%E7%9A%84%E7%88%B1%E5%A5%BD%E2%80%A6%3C%2Fp%3E%22%2C%22content%22%3A%22%3Cp%20style%3D%5C%22white-space%3A%20pre-wrap%3B%20min-height%3A%201.5em%3B%5C%22%3E%3Cspan%20class%3D%5C%22audio%5C%22%3E%3Caudio%20controls%3D%5C%22controls%5C%22%20controlslist%3D%5C%22nodownload%5C%22%3E%3Csource%20src%3D%5C%22https%3A%2F%2Fuploadstatic.mihoyo.com%2Fys-obc%2F2022%2F01%2F16%2F291696164%2F35bcd1ceef936fce2157a53de223f607_8988221935060327565.mp3%5C%22%3E%3C%2Faudio%3E%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fp%3E%3Cp%20style%3D%5C%22white-space%3A%20pre-wrap%3B%5C%22%3E%E6%96%97%E8%99%AB%E3%80%81%E6%89%93%E7%89%8C%E3%80%81%E9%99%80%E8%9E%BA%E3%80%81%E5%89%91%E7%8E%89%E3%80%81%E6%8D%89%E8%BF%B7%E8%97%8F%E2%80%A6%E6%80%BB%E4%B9%8B%E4%BD%A0%E6%83%B3%E5%BE%97%E5%88%B0%E7%9A%84%E6%83%B3%E4%B8%8D%E5%88%B0%E7%9A%84%EF%BC%8C%E6%88%91%E5%85%A8%E9%83%BD%E4%BC%9A%EF%BC%81%E6%80%8E%E4%B9%88%E6%A0%B7%EF%BC%9F%E8%A6%81%E6%AF%94%E4%BB%80%E4%B9%88%EF%BC%9F%E5%81%9A%E5%A5%BD%E5%85%A8%E7%9B%98%E7%9A%86%E8%BE%93%E7%9A%84%E5%87%86%E5%A4%87%E5%90%A7%EF%BC%81%E5%93%88%E5%93%88%E5%93%88%E5%93%88%EF%BC%81%3C%2Fp%3E%22%7D%7D%2C%7B%22tmplKey%22%3A%22fold%22%2C%22partKey%22%3A%22main%22%2C%22data%22%3A%7B%22layout_%22%3A%22banner%22%2C%22title%22%3A%22%3Cp%20style%3D%5C%22white-space%3A%20pre-wrap%3B%5C%22%3E%E8%8D%92%E6%B3%B7%E4%B8%80%E6%96%97%E7%9A%84%E7%83%A6%E6%81%BC%E2%80%A6%3C%2Fp%3E%22%2C%22content%22%3A%22%3Cp%20style%3D%5C%22white-space%3A%20pre-wrap%3B%20min-height%3A%201.5em%3B%5C%22%3E%3Cspan%20class%3D%5C%22audio%5C%22%3E%3Caudio%20controls%3D%5C%22controls%5C%22%20controlslist%3D%5C%22nodownload%5C%22%3E%3Csource%20src%3D%5C%22https%3A%2F%2Fuploadstatic.mihoyo.com%2Fys-obc%2F2022%2F01%2F16%2F291696164%2F3b9a1a10e7d55b923a60ca8c32657088_797906696901858587.mp3%5C%22%3E%3C%2Faudio%3E%3C% data-ts="1642316045071" data-col-type="l2r1"><div style="order: 0;"> <div data-part="main" data-tmpl="fold" class="obc-tmpl__part obc-tmpl-fold obc-tmpl__part--main obc-tmpl__part--fold obc-tmpl__part--align-banner"><div class="obc-tmpl__rich-text obc-tmpl-fold__title"><p style="white-space: pre-wrap;">荒泷一斗的爱好…</p></div> <div class="obc-tmpl__paragraph-box obc-tmpl__rich-text"><p style="white-space: pre-wrap; min-height: 1.5em;"><span class="audio"><audio controls="controls" controlslist="nodownload"><source src="https://uploadstatic.mihoyo.com/ys-obc/2022/01/16/291696164/35bcd1ceef936fce2157a53de223f607_8988221935060327565.mp3"></audio></span></p><p style="white-space: pre-wrap;">斗虫、打牌、陀螺、剑玉、捉迷藏…总之你想得到的想不到的，我全都会！怎么样？要比什么？做好全盘皆输的准备吧！哈哈哈哈！</p></div> <div class="obc-tmpl__fold-tag">
      [<span class="obc-tmpl__fold-text">折叠</span><span class="obc-tmpl__expand-text">展开</span>]
    </div></div></div><div style="order: 1;"> <div data-part="main" data-tmpl="fold" class="obc-tmpl__part obc-tmpl-fold obc-tmpl__part--main obc-tmpl__part--fold obc-tmpl__part--align-banner"><div class="obc-tmpl__rich-text obc-tmpl-fold__title"><p style="white-space: pre-wrap;">荒泷一斗的烦恼…</p></div> <div class="obc-tmpl__paragraph-box obc-tmpl__rich-text"><p style="white-space: pre-wrap; min-height: 1.5em;"><span class="audio"><audio controls="controls" controlslist="nodownload"><source src="https://uploadstatic.mihoyo.com/ys-obc/2022/01/16/291696164/3b9a1a10e7d55b923a60ca8c32657088_797906696901858587.mp3"></audio></span></p><p style="white-space: pre-wrap;">「鬼婆婆」不是鬼，她可是世界上对我最好的人类，只是因为收养了我才会被叫鬼婆婆的。我怎么样都无所谓，反正我也不在乎别人的看法…唉，但我不想她因为我而被别人指指点点…</p></div> <div class="obc-tmpl__fold-tag">
      [<span class="obc-tmpl__fold-text">折叠</span><span class="obc-tmpl__expand-text">展开</span>]

data-ts="1642316118533" data-col-type="l2r1"><div style="order: 0;"> <div data-part="main" data-tmpl="fold" class="obc-tmpl__part obc-tmpl-fold obc-tmpl__part--main obc-tmpl__part--fold obc-tmpl__part--align-banner"><div class="obc-tmpl__rich-text obc-tmpl-fold__title"><p style="white-space: pre-wrap;">喜欢的食物…</p></div> <div class="obc-tmpl__paragraph-box obc-tmpl__rich-text"><p pre-wrap;">棒棒糖全身都是宝，不但糖好吃，棍子叼在嘴里还很帅，为我增添了一丝不羁的气质，来，你也试试吧。</p></div> <div class="obc-tmpl__fold-tag">
      [<span class="obc-tmpl__fold-text">折叠</span><span class="obc-tmpl__expand-text">展开</span>]
    </div></div></div><div style="order: 1;"> <div data-part="main" data-tmpl="fold" class="obc-tmpl__part obc-tmpl-fold obc-tmpl__part--main obc-tmpl__part--fold obc-tmpl__part--align-banner"><div class="obc-tmpl__rich-text obc-tmpl-fold__title"><p style="white-space: pre-wrap;">讨厌的食物…</p></div> <div class="obc-tmpl__paragraph-box obc-tmpl__rich-text"><p style="white-space: pre-wrap; min-height: 1.5em;"><span class="audio"><audio controls="controls" controlslist="nodownload"><source src="https://uploadstatic.mihoyo.com/ys-obc/2022/01/16/291696164/3df43b1da1d7beaae30cd862e6d2b919_6476331313224433167.mp3"></audio></span></p><p style="white-space: pre-wrap;">我是鬼我是鬼啊！最讨厌的当然是豆子啊！黄豆、绿豆通通不行，别说吃了，光是碰到身上都会过敏。唉，所以说，撒豆子这种陋习还是赶紧灭绝吧。</p></div> <div class="obc-tmpl__fold-tag">
